sub_title: China Digital Tech Analyst helping you understand China's internet sector. Writer, Public Speaker, Study Tour Leader.
summary:
With ChinaTalk my goal is to help people understand China, especially it's digital innovation and internet space. I worked as a marketing consultant for local Chinese NGOs in Xi'an, China for several years. I gained extensive knowledge about digital China and cultural differences in this capacity. I have written hundreds of articles about China and given many lectures at universitities (of applied sciences) and seminars. Since 2018 I develop and deliver study tours to China, focussing on digital innovation and New Retail.

Before focussing my career on China, I was active in database marketing and CRM for 25 years and and worked with multinationals in a wide variety of industries, including pet food, office supplies, tissue manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, financial services, wine distribution and travel. I co-wrote the award-winning book 'Event Driven Marketing' and its international version 'Follow That Customer' and was a teacher at Beeckestijn Business. School.

The tours consist of a combination of lectures, in which theoretical background is given, company visits and 'city safaris' where participants can experience Chinese technology in practice. Important themes include e-commerce, instant retail, new retail, (super) apps, O2O/local services and cross-border e-commerce from China.
